data.hint: If a word ends with -or, -ling, -smus or -ig, it always has DER.
German words that begin with ge- are usually neuter (DAS).
Any noun ending in -ung, -schaft, -keit or -heit will always be DIE.
The large majority of nouns which end in -e are feminine (DIE).
The majority of singular nouns ending in -er are masculine (DER).
The large majority of nouns beginning with Ge- are neuter (DAS).
